name: Healthruwords Slider
author: Arnaud Saint-Paul

sections.description:
Ever wanted to empower your audience with some unique Inspirational Healthruwords Quotes. The renown HealThruWords quotes already inspire millions every month through social media. Offer the best motivational quotes on earth to your community!

HealThruWords Slider Widget is a responsive slider widget that displays up to 20 Inspirational Quotes from https://HealThruWords.com.

Join the Positive ReEvolution.

Plugin Features

*Easy install
*Very easy to configure.
*Display Inspirational Quotes through a configurable slider Widget.

Rate Us / Feedback

Please take the time to let us and others know about your experiences by leaving a review, so that we can improve the plugin for you and other users.

If you like the plugin please Rate Us.

Want More?

If You Want more functionality or some modifications, just drop us a line what you want and We will try to add or modify the plugin functions.

Available Languages

English
sections.installation:
Installation consists of following steps:

  1. Upload “Healthruwords Slider Widget” to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place the “Healthruwords Slider ” Widget on your sidebar and add configure it.
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Initial release

1.05

  • Fixed issue with shortcode not working in posts and pages.

1.1

  • Update the affiliate variable and sid

1.2

  • Added code to make the slider responsive

1.3

  • Changed protocol from HTTP to HTTPS
